name: paymentAuthorizationViewController(_:didSelectShippingContact:completion:)
desc: Tells the delegate that the user selected a shipping address, and asks for an updated payment request. DeprecatedUse paymentAuthorizationViewController(_:didSelectShippingContact:handler:) instead.
declaration:
optional func paymentAuthorizationViewController(_ controller: PKPaymentAuthorizationViewController, 
                        didSelectShippingContact contact: PKContact, 
                                      completion: @escaping (PKPaymentAuthorizationStatus, [PKShippingMethod], [PKPaymentSummaryItem]) -> Void)
